name: Welz and Weisel Communications
tag_list: tech-pr-agency, technology-pr-firms, technology-pr-companies, technology-pr-agency, technology-pr-agencies, welz--weisel-communications, tony-welz, evan-weisel
overview:
Welz & Weisel Communications, a leading tech PR agency based in Washington, DC metro is focused on creating awareness and credibility campaigns for information technology companies in both the business-to-business and business-to-government markets.

Our tech PR firm employs a senior team that not only understands technology public relations, but also the business world. Based on our years of experience, we are able to translate technical speak into value statements that resonate with our clients’ key audiences.

We work closely with our clients to understand their value proposition, as well as the key technology themes, issues and trends that they can address. Using this knowledge, Welz & Weisel Communications creates proactive technology PR campaigns that integrate a variety of communications tools to tell our clients’ stories and set them apart from the competition.

Whether working with small and medium-sized businesses or Fortune 500 companies, we become an integral part of our client’s marketing team. This is the only way we can attain our high-standard of results.

Welz & Weisel Communications, Washington, DC’s leading technology PR firm was founded by Tony Welz & Evan Weisel in 2003.

external_links.title: Washingtonian Selects Welz & Weisel, tech PR agency as a “Great Place to Work”
